subtitle: beloved ground crew I am Meera of the
pleadian High

see the great strides you are making the
Bold steps you take towards the light
many of you have experienced moments of
great release since our last
communication a collective shedding of
old
patterns if this hasn't yet occurred for
you rest assured beloved one it is on
its
[Music]
way today I wish to speak to you all on
moving beyond the divisions that still
linger within your
Consciousness imagine if you will a
single branch on a great Tree of Life
attached to a huge trunk looking around
you can see hundreds of other branches
of their own being yet always attached
to the same
trunk those of clear mind and open heart
will recognize that this single Branch
despite its unique appearance Remains
the Same in essence as all the others it
is merely a different
appearance the bridge to Prime Creator
is that great trunk that all are
connected to and they have that same
Source within all of
them in the same way each person
regardless of skin color hair type body
shape language or belief is
fundamentally the same we all originate
from the same Divine Source each of us
carrying within us the same potential
and spiritual
capability the differences we see among
individuals whether cultural racial or
social are but external layers shaped by
genetics upbringing and Life Experiences
these layers do not Define the true self
which at its core is pure directly
connected to the Divine and
intrinsically linked with all other

Souls you have been conditioned to
evaluate others based on their
appearance and title and external
circumstances the first question you ask
others is so John what do you do why do
you ask this question to build
information about the individual based
on their outer
conditions we would highly advise you to
stop doing this start to activate Soul
sight and see their true Essence before
you even begin to communicate with them
feel their true self this is the
greatest gift you can give
[Music]
them it is important to recognize that
each person comes into this life
equipped with different abilities shaped

their previous
incarnations these abilities influence
how they navigate challenges and seize
opportunities indeed you enter each
Earthly Incarnation carrying with you

Evolution from this Essence all else in

utilizes their
circumstances every person shares the

potential every soul is capable of

reach profound spiritual
Heights seeing others as their true self
greatly assist them to awaken and that's

plays a crucial role within your
environment no matter how small or
unnoticed you may feel from the family

person's contribution is unique and
irreplaceable the absence of any one
individual leaves a void that impacts

significantly your significance cannot
be diminished except by your own refusal
to recognize your inherent
[Music]
value so my fellow Divine Souls the next

actions look deeper and recognize the

Essence that resides within you we all

know that we are close my friends ever
